metadata.title: CVE-2017-14130 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The _bfd_elf_parse_attributes function in elf-attrs.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (_bfd_elf_attr_strdupheap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
